thread.title: Singer Joy Villa makes political statement with Donald Trump dress at the Grammys
thread.title_full: Singer Joy Villa makes political statement with Donald Trump dress at the Grammys

author: Mark Molloy
title: Singer Joy Villa makes political statement with Donald Trump dress at the Grammys
text:
Singer Joy Villa makes political statement with Donald Trump dress at the Grammys Joy Villa wore a pro-Donald Trump dress at the Grammys Credit: AFP / Getty Mark Molloy 13 February 2017 ‚Ä¢ 11:18am 
S inger Joy Villa had one of the most eye-catching outfits at the Grammys with her ‚ÄòMake America Great Again‚Äô dress in support of Donald Trump. 
The 25-year-old American gained tens of thousands of followers on social media, many of them Trump supporters, after showcasing a red, white and blue dress with the president‚Äôs campaign slogan in large letters. She arrives on the red carpet Singer Joy Villa before revealing her Trump dress Credit: Getty She reveals the 'Make America Great Again' Dress 'Make America Great Again' Credit: AP 
I t was created by Filipino-born designer Andre Soriano, who described the outfit as ‚Äúa tribute to OUR President of the United States‚Äù. 
In an Instagram post, the singer urged her followers to ‚Äúsee the person over the politics‚Äù. One the red carpet Credit: AFP / Getty A photo posted by Joy Villa (@joyvilla) on Feb 12, 2017 at 5:27pm PST 
‚ÄúSometimes you just gotta be free to express yourself,‚Äù she wrote. ‚ÄúThank you to all of my supporters and fellow believers. Life is about living free and loving it. Be your beautiful selves tonight!‚Äù 
S he added: ‚ÄúGo big, or go home. You can either stand for what you believe or fall for what you don't. Above all make a choice for tolerance and love. Agree to disagree. See the person over the politics, carry yourself with dignity, always. Life is made to be lived, so go boldly and give no effs.‚Äù 
It‚Äôs not the first outfit Villa has worn to the Grammys to make headlines, in 2015 the performer wore an orange ‚Äòdress‚Äô made from recycled fencing. Give @Joy_Villa a follow! #JoyVilla #Grammys #Trump pic.twitter.com/AGdKRH0CGL ‚Äî Immigrants‚òÜ4‚òÜTrump (@immigrant4trump) February 13, 2017 The Annual 59th Grammy Awards @realDonaldTrump @Joy_Villa A Tribute OUR President Of The United‚Ä¶ https://t.co/7u9LOEYrP8 ‚Äî Andre Soriano (@andresoriano) February 12, 2017 @immigrant4trump @SoarForFreedom @Joy_Villa We need so many more actresses like her to stand up to the #NWO #Liberals .
